title: Chiropractor - One Source Integrative Medicine | Florence, SC
description: One Source Integrative Medicine Florence, SC - acupuncture, chiropractic care, acupuncture for fertility, and integrative medicine. patient-centered approach!
cleaned_text: Welcome to One Source Integrative Medicine Patient-Centered Functional Medicine and Primary Care One Source Integrative Medicine is a Direct Primary Care Functional Family Medicine practice. At One Source Integrative Medicine we employ a more personalized, patient-centered, whole-person approach to healthcare, rather than a conventional, one-size-fits-all, disease-oriented focus. Whether you are currently healthy and want a partner in maintaining good health or you are suffering with chronic pain and want to achieve your best possible health, we foster a proactive, vested partnership between patient and provider. Through this vested partnership, we strive to help heal, educate, and empower our patients. By supporting every patient's personal potential for optimal physical, mental, and emotional health, we seek to promote and restore wellness throughout one's lifetime. Here at One Source Integrative Medicine in Florence SC, we offer a variety of services to help you achieve optimal wellness and overall health. Our medical practitioners are dedicated to the health and well-being of the patients, addressing all their health concerns holistically: treating their entire mind, body, and spirit. We offer treatment options for a wide variety of illnesses and conditions to help you feel your best every day. This includes [acupuncture](https://www.onesourceintegrativemed.com/acupuncture/), [chiropractic care](https://www.onesourceintegrativemed.com/chiropractic/) & adjustments, [infertility](https://www.onesourceintegrativemed.com/acupuncture-for-infertility/) treatments, massage therapy, anxiety
